title: and viewers fear Gray's violent response
text:

EastEnders viewers were devastated tonight after Chantelle Atkins lost her unborn baby.

On Monday night’s episode, Gary made the exciting pregnant announcement to their friends and family at the Queen Vic.

Chantelle experienced pain in her stomach but when Gary came to check on her she hid her fears.

Viewers watched tonight as Chantelle went to the hospital alone for an ultrasound scan and was given some horrific news.

She was about to leave after receiving a phone call from Gray, so was shocked when Iqra’s girlfriend, Ash, came in to deliver a devastating blow.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

Confirming Chantelle’s worst fears, Ash said: “I’m so sorry Mrs Atkins.”

Heartbroken Chantelle looked upwards at the screen as she processed the traumatic news.

Ash tried to comfort Chantelle and told her it was not her fault and it is too common this early in the pregnancy.

Emotional Chantelle asked Ash if it was possible to keep the loss of the baby between themselves.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

When she arrived home, Chantelle was surprised to see Leo, who congratulated her on the baby news.

She was met with constant reminders of the baby, including Honey telling her not to do any lifting and asking about baby names in the shop.

Chantelle couldn’t bring herself to tell Gray, realising how happy he was and that he had controlled his violent anger issues.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

EastEnders viewers took to Twitter after watching the heartbreaking scenes - fearing for Chantelle's future.

One viewer tweeted: "Feel really heartbroken for Chantelle right now. Bad enough being trapped with the horrible Gray and now this. Girl needs some family support!"

"I’m so heartbroken for Chantelle. She needs to get out of that house for good," added another.

My heart breaks for Chantelle, she deserves better

awww Chantelle this is heart breaking I need tissues

* EastEnders airs Mondays and Fridays at 8pm, and Tuesdays and Thursdays at 7:30pm on BBC One
description: Chantelle was heartbroken after being told she had lost the baby - but was scared to tell husband Gray
